rqa.data.reader package¶

Submodules¶

class rqa.data.reader.base.DataReader(file_paths, dataset_obj)[source]¶

Bases: object

DataReader Base Class

  • Args:
    file_paths: dictionary of consisting (‘train’ and ‘vaild’) file_path dataset_obj: Dataset Object (rqa.data.dataset.base)

Batch to Dataset

class rqa.data.reader.seq_cls.SeqClsReader(file_paths, tokenizers, sequence_max_length=None, class_key='class')[source]¶

Bases: rqa.data.reader.base.DataReader

DataReader for Sequence Classification

  • Args:
    file_paths: .json file paths (train and dev) tokenizers: define tokenizers config (word)
  • Kwargs:
    class_key: name of the label in .json file to use for classification
read_one_example(inputs)[source]¶

inputs keys: sequence

class rqa.data.reader.seq_cls_bert.SeqClsBertReader(file_paths, tokenizers, sequence_max_length=None, class_key='class')[source]¶

Bases: rqa.data.reader.base.DataReader

DataReader for Sequence Classification using BERT

  • Args:
    file_paths: .json file paths (train and dev) tokenizers: define tokenizers config (subword)
  • Kwargs:
    lang_code: language code: set as ‘ko’ if using BERT model trained with mecab-tokenized data class_key: name of the label in .json file to use for classification

class rqa.data.reader.tok_cls_bert.TokClsBertReader(file_paths, tokenizers, lang_code=None, sequence_max_length=None, tag_key='tags', ignore_tag_idx=-1)[source]¶

Bases: rqa.data.reader.base.DataReader

DataReader for Token Classification using BERT

  • Args:
    file_paths: .json file paths (train and dev) tokenizers: define tokenizers config (subword)
  • Kwargs:
    lang_code: language code: set as ‘ko’ if using BERT model trained with mecab-tokenized data tag_key: name of the label in .json file to use for classification ignore_tag_idx: prediction results that have this number as ground-truth idx are ignored
CLS_TOKEN = '[CLS]'¶
CONTINUE_SYMBOL = '##'¶
SEP_TOKEN = '[SEP]'¶
UNK_TOKEN = '[UNK]'¶
